entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:40 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
